00047 // This should generate a core dump
00048 #ifdef HT_USE_ABORT
00049 #define HT_ABORT abort()
00050 #else
00051 #define HT_ABORT *((int *)0) = 1
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 // printf interface macro helper
00055 #define HT_LOG(_enabled_, _cat_, msg) do { \
00056   if (Logger::logger->_enabled_()) { \
00057     if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00058       Logger::logger->_cat_("(%s:%d) %s", __FILE__, __LINE__, msg); \
00059     else \
00060       Logger::logger->_cat_("%s", msg); \
00061   } \
00062 } while (0)
00063 
00064 #define HT_LOGF(_enabled_, _cat_, msg, ...) do { \
00065   if (Logger::logger->_enabled_()) { \
00066     if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00067       Logger::logger->_cat_("(%s:%d) " msg, __FILE__, __LINE__, __VA_ARGS__); \
00068     else \
00069       Logger::logger->_cat_(msg, __VA_ARGS__);  \
00070   } \
00071 } while (0)
00072 
00073 // stream interface macro helpers
00074 #define HT_OUT(_enabled_, _l_) do { if (Logger::logger->_enabled_()) { \
00075   char logbuf[1024]; \
00076   log4cpp::Priority::PriorityLevel _level_ = log4cpp::Priority::_l_; \
00077   FixedOstream _out_(logbuf, sizeof(logbuf)); \
00078   if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00079     _out_ <<"("<< __FILE__ <<':'<< __LINE__ <<") "; \
00080   _out_
00081 
00082 #define HT_OUT2(_enabled_, _l_) do { if (Logger::logger->_enabled_()) { \
00083   char logbuf[1024]; \
00084   log4cpp::Priority::PriorityLevel _level_ = log4cpp::Priority::_l_; \
00085   FixedOstream _out_(logbuf, sizeof(logbuf)); \
00086   _out_ << __func__; \
00087   if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00088     _out_ << " ("<< __FILE__ <<':'<< __LINE__ <<")"; \
00089   _out_ <<": "
00090 
00091 #define HT_END ""; Logger::logger->log(_level_, _out_.str()); \
00092   if (_level_ == log4cpp::Priority::FATAL) HT_ABORT; \
00093 } /* if enabled */ } while (0)
00094 
00095 #define HT_OUT_DISABLED do { if (0) {
00096 
00097 // helpers for printing a first n bytes
00098 #define HT_HEAD_(_x_, _l_, _n_) \
00099   String((char *)(_x_), 0, (_n_) < (_l_) ? (_n_) : (_l_))
00100 
00101 #define HT_HEAD(_x_, _n_) \
00102   String(_x_, 0, (_n_) < (_x_).length() ? (_n_) : (_x_).length())

00105 // Logging macros interface starts here
00106 #ifndef HT_DISABLE_LOG_ALL
00107 
00108 #ifndef HT_DISABLE_LOG_DEBUG
00109 
00110 #define HT_LOG_ENTER do { \
00111   if (Logger::logger->isDebugEnabled()) {\
00112     if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00113       Logger::logger->debug("(%s:%d) %s() ENTER", __FILE__, __LINE__, HT_FUNC); \
00114     else \
00115       Logger::logger->debug("%s() ENTER", HT_FUNC); \
00116   } \
00117 } while(0)
00118 
00119 #define HT_LOG_EXIT do { \
00120   if (Logger::logger->isDebugEnabled()) { \
00121     if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00122       Logger::logger->debug("(%s:%d) %s() EXIT", __FILE__, __LINE__, HT_FUNC); \
00123     else \
00124       Logger::logger->debug("%s() EXIT", HT_FUNC); \
00125   } \
00126 } while(0)
00127 
00128 #define HT_DEBUG(msg) HT_LOG(isDebugEnabled, debug, msg)
00129 #define HT_DEBUGF(msg, ...) HT_LOGF(isDebugEnabled, debug, msg, __VA_ARGS__)
00130 #define HT_DEBUG_OUT HT_OUT2(isDebugEnabled, DEBUG)
00131 #else
00132 #define HT_LOG_ENTER
00133 #define HT_LOG_EXIT
00134 #define HT_DEBUG(msg)
00135 #define HT_DEBUGF(msg, ...)
00136 #define HT_DEBUG_OUT HT_OUT_DISABLED
00137 #endif

00209 #ifndef HT_DISABLE_LOG_FATAL
00210 #define HT_FATAL(msg) do { \
00211   if (Logger::logger->isFatalEnabled()) { \
00212     if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00213       Logger::logger->fatal("(%s:%d) %s", __FILE__, __LINE__, msg); \
00214     else \
00215       Logger::logger->fatal("%s", msg); \
00216     HT_ABORT; \
00217   } \
00218 } while (0)
00219 #define HT_FATALF(msg, ...) do { \
00220   if (Logger::logger->isFatalEnabled()) { \
00221     if (Logger::show_line_numbers) \
00222       Logger::logger->fatal("(%s:%d) " msg, __FILE__, __LINE__, __VA_ARGS__); \
00223     else \
00224       Logger::logger->fatal(msg, __VA_ARGS__);  \
00225     HT_ABORT; \
00226   } \
00227 } while (0)
00228 #define HT_FATAL_OUT HT_OUT2(isFatalEnabled, FATAL)
00229 #define HT_EXPECT(_e_, _code_) do { if (_e_); else { \
00230     if (_code_ == Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION) \
00231       HT_FATAL("failed expectation: " #_e_); \
00232     HT_THROW(_code_, "failed expectation: " #_e_); } \
00233 } while (0)
00234 #else
00235 #define HT_FATAL(msg)
00236 #define HT_FATALF(msg, ...)
00237 #define HT_FATAL_OUT HT_OUT_DISABLED
00238 #define HT_EXPECT(_e_, _code_) do { if (_e_); else \
00239   HT_THROW(_code_, "failed expectation: " #_e_); \
00240 } while (0)
00241 #endif
00242 
00243 #else // HT_DISABLE_LOGGING
